name: WKGestureRecognizer
desc: The base class for all other gesture recognizer classes.

items.name: func locationInObject() -> CGPoint
items.desc: Returns the point computed as the current position of the touch event.

items.name: func objectBounds() -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the dimensions of the interface object (measured in points) associated with the gesture recognizer.

items.name: var state: WKGestureRecognizerState
items.desc: The current state of the gesture recognizer.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the gesture recognizer is enabled.

items.name: enum WKGestureRecognizerState
items.desc: Constants describing the possible states of a gesture recognizer.
